member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264
member.summary: Represents encoder codec configuration support for H.264 encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264.SupportFlags
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of flags from the specifying which optional features are supported for the codec.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_SUPPORT_H264.DisableDeblockingFilterSupportedModes
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of flags specifying the allowed modes supported for disable_deblocking_filter_idc syntax for H264 spec.
